attributes.action: pressure Guardian Media to reinstate the formats of local Saga radio that have been abolished in favour of new Smooth Fm branding
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Over recent years Saga's local radio stations in the East/West Midlands and Glasgow have gained a reputation for providing a truly unique service aimed at the over 50s, but was also much loved by younger listeners too. Now GMG have rebranded it Smooth Radio, the revised format will echo that of any other of the myriad of middle of the road stations, and deprive listeners of a high quality, varied alternative.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
